department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Digital Humanities 2.0: a metaLAB(at)Harvard seminar
course.description: A seminar and workshop for the development of semester-long projects, the course provides an introduction to new scholarly models in the arts and humanities via readings, case studies and conversations with expert practitioners.
course.notes: Conducted in English. Not open to students currently enrolled in Literature 110.
